templates.name: How do I layer my products?
templates.content: We know that everyone is different, and we encourage you to try using the products in ways that work best for your hair. As a general rule of thumb, products should be layered in the following order: step 1: shampoo/conditioner/masques, step 2: detanglers, heat protectants, leave-in conditioners, step 3: creams, mousses, gels, step 4: nourishing oils, serums and step 5: dry products like hair sprays and dry volume sprays.

templates.name: Do your products including bleu contain nut derived oils?
templates.content: Yes, we purposely utilize low percentages of oils in select R+Co formulations. The rich nutrients of oils are known to provide excellent benefits for hair smoothing, shine, and nourishment.

templates.name: Do your products including bleu contain silicone?
templates.content: Yes, we strategically utilize high-performance silicones in many of our products to achieve just the right amount of slip and feel, leaving hair moisturized and protected. The silicones we use are of a higher quality. Lower-grade silicones act as 'fillers' which can build up, leaving hair weighed down and overloaded.

templates.name: Are your products including bleu color safe?
templates.content: Yes, all of the shampoos are safe for color-treated hair.

templates.name: Are your products including bleu safe to use with keratin treatments?
templates.content: Yes, our hair care products are safe for use in keratin treatments. We don't use Sodium Lauryl Sulfate or Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, both of which can be harsh, stripping and could potentially shorten the length of time that a straightening process lasts.

templates.name: Do your products including bleu contain alcohol?
templates.content: Yes, in order to maintain a high level of performance, a certain amount of alcohols are necessary in specific formulations. However, they are cosmetic-grade alcohols that won't dry or strip the hair. As a result, you can get the style you want without the negative effects that alcohols are sometimes associated with.

templates.name: Are your products including bleu 100% natural?
templates.content: We use only the finest ingredients in our products, many of which are natural ingredients. However, in the pursuit to provide uncompromised performance, many of our ingredients are specially formulated and often synthetically derived.

templates.name: Do your products including bleu contain phthalates?
templates.content: No, our products don't contain phthalates.

templates.name: Are your products safe to use on extensions?
templates.content: Our products are formulated without sulfates SLS and SLES (known to break down the bonds used on hair extensions). Our products should be safe to use on human hair extensions, however, due to the variety of bonding agents in extensions on the market, we recommend checking with your stylist - just to be safe!
